comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of October 2, 1913, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B04EED7163DE633A... Sapper O'Neill and Young Fox were British boxers and George McDonald their manager. McDonald and O'Neill had arrived the day before. Young Fox was expected a couple of weeks later.

comment.author: 34997905@N03
comment._content: Thanks, Wystan. Will submit for correction to the catalog record.
